targets.query: SELECT mean("pe1_L_modulation")   * $max_heating_power_of_smart_XS / $useful_heat_of_1_kg_pellets * $sampling_interval / 60  / 100 * $correction_factor_heating_power  FROM "oekofen" WHERE "pe1_L_modulation" >10 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)

SELECT mean("pe1_L_modulation")   * $max_heating_power_of_smart_XS / $useful_heat_of_1_kg_pellets * $sampling_interval / 60  / 100 * $correction_factor_heating_power  FROM "oekofen" WHERE "pe1_L_modulation" >10 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT  mean("pe1_L_state")  FROM "oekofen" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)

SELECT mean("pe1_L_modulation")   * $max_heating_power_of_smart_XS / $useful_heat_of_1_kg_pellets * $sampling_interval / 60  / 100 * $correction_factor_heating_power  FROM "oekofen" WHERE "pe1_L_modulation" >10 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT moving_average(mean("system_L_ambient"), 360) FROM "oekofen" WHERE time > $__from GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT difference(mean( "pe1_L_starts"))  FROM "oekofen" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)

SELECT mean("pe1_L_modulation")   * $max_heating_power_of_smart_XS * $sampling_interval / 60 / 100 * $correction_factor_heating_power FROM "oekofen" WHERE "pe1_L_modulation" >10 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)

SELECT mean("pe1_L_modulation")   * $max_heating_power_of_smart_XS * $sampling_interval / 60 / 100 * $correction_factor_heating_power FROM "oekofen" WHERE "pe1_L_modulation" >10 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(count("pe1_L_modulation"), 1m) *4 FROM "oekofen" WHERE "pe1_L_modulation" >10 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT difference(mean( "pe1_L_starts"))  FROM "oekofen" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(4m)

panels.title: mittlere Laufzeit in den letzten 24 h [min]

targets.query: SELECT last("pe1_storage_fill_today") / $correction_factor_storage_fill FROM "oekofen" WHERE ("bereich" = 'pe1') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("system_L_ambient") FROM "oekofen" WHERE ("bereich" = 'system') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(count("pe1_L_modulation"), 1m) *4 FROM "oekofen" WHERE "pe1_L_modulation" >70 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT difference(mean( "pe1_L_starts"))  FROM "oekofen" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(4m)

panels.title: mittlere Vollastlaufzeit (>70%) in den letzten 24 h [min]

targets.query: SELECT last("pe1_storage_fill_yesterday") / $correction_factor_storage_fill FROM "oekofen" WHERE ("bereich" = 'pe1') AND $timeFilter
SELECT non_negative_derivative(count("pe1_L_modulation"), 1m) *4 FROM "oekofen" WHERE "pe1_L_modulation" = 30 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT difference(mean( "pe1_L_starts"))  FROM "oekofen" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(4m)

panels.title: mittlere Minimumlastlaufzeit (30%) in den letzten 24 h [min]

targets.query: SELECT last( "pe1_L_storage_fill") / 1000.0  FROM "oekofen" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)

panels.description: Minuten mit Modulation >10 zählen und in 4min-Blöcken addieren.

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(count("pe1_L_modulation"), 1m) *4 FROM "oekofen" WHERE "pe1_L_modulation" >10 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)

panels.title: Laufzeit im selektierten Zeitraum

panels.description: Minuten mit Modulation >10 zählen und in 4min-Blöcken addieren.

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(count("pe1_L_modulation"), 1m) *4 FROM "oekofen" WHERE "pe1_L_modulation" >10 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)

panels.title: Laufzeit letzte 24h

targets.query: SELECT mean("pe1_L_modulation")   * $max_heating_power_of_smart_XS / $useful_heat_of_1_kg_pellets * $sampling_interval / 60  / 100 * $correction_factor_heating_power * $cost_of_pellets_per_kg  FROM "oekofen" WHERE "pe1_L_modulation" >10 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)

SELECT mean("pe1_L_modulation")   * $max_heating_power_of_smart_XS * $sampling_interval / 60 / 100 * $correction_factor_heating_power * $CO2_emission_per_kWh / $CO2_emission_VW_up_per_km FROM "oekofen" WHERE "pe1_L_modulation" >10 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)

panels.title: = Wegstrecke mit VW Up 1.0 Ecofuel ($CO2_emission_VW_up_per_km g CO2/km)

targets.query: SELECT mean("pe1_L_modulation")   * $max_heating_power_of_smart_XS / $useful_heat_of_1_kg_pellets * $sampling_interval / 60  / 100 * $correction_factor_heating_power * $cost_of_pellets_per_kg  FROM "oekofen" WHERE "pe1_L_modulation" >10 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT last("pe1_L_modulation") FROM "oekofen" WHERE ("bereich" = 'pe1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("pe1_L_modulation")   * $max_heating_power_of_smart_XS * $sampling_interval / 60 / 100 * $correction_factor_heating_power * $CO2_emission_per_kWh FROM "oekofen" WHERE "pe1_L_modulation" >10 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)

panels.title: CO2 Ausstoss im selektierten Zeitraum ( $CO2_emission_per_kWh g CO2  pro kWh)

targets.query: SELECT mean("pe1_L_modulation")   * $max_heating_power_of_smart_XS * $sampling_interval / 60 / 100 * $correction_factor_heating_power * $fine_dust_per_kWh FROM "oekofen" WHERE "pe1_L_modulation" >10 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT mean("pe1_L_modulation")   /100 * $max_heating_power_of_smart_XS * $correction_factor_heating_power FROM "oekofen" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(4m)
SELECT mean("pe1_storage_fill_today") /  $correction_factor_storage_fill  FROM "oekofen" WHERE ("bereich" = 'pe1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("pe1_storage_fill_yesterday") /  $correction_factor_storage_fill  FROM "oekofen" WHERE ("bereich" = 'pe1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
